messages.msg: Hello
Welcome to FightLust.com! How can we support you in your journey towards healing today?
Are you a real person

We understand that sometimes you need to talk to a real person for prayer, guidance, or encouragement. We are here to support you. Please hold as we connect you with a ministry team member who can assist you in your journey. If you’re unable to reach someone, feel free to email us at prayer@fightlust.com.
Okay
Thank you for your patience! A ministry team member will be with you shortly to provide the support you need. If you have any specific questions or requests, feel free to share them while you wait.
Yes I have a physical injury chronic illness. Asking for prayer for healing. It affects my manhood

Thank you for sharing your prayer request. We're here to pray with you and for you. Let's lift you up in prayer for healing and strength. 

Heavenly Father, we come before you today, asking for your healing touch upon our friend. We pray for restoration and strength in their body, especially in the areas affected by their chronic illness. Lord, we trust in your power to heal and bring comfort. May your peace surround them during this time. In Jesus' name, we pray. Amen.

If you have any specific scriptures or additional requests you'd like us to include in our prayers, please let us know!
There is more to be said it affects me sexually. And I'm unable to have relations with my wife. So since we're not able to do intercourse it has caused the strain on your marriage.

Thank you for sharing that with me. It’s understandable that this situation can be very challenging and can put a strain on your marriage. We’re here to support you through this difficult time.

Let’s pray for healing not just for your physical body, but also for your marriage. 

Heavenly Father, we lift up our friend and their marriage to you. We ask for healing in their body and restoration in their relationship. Please bring understanding, love, and support between them and their spouse during this time. Help them to communicate openly and find strength in each other. May your grace and peace fill their hearts. In Jesus' name, we pray. Amen.

If you’d like to talk more about this or need specific resources to help you and your wife, please let me know.
Our communication is very open before the injury we had good sex life. So we started talking about alternatives.

It's great to hear that you and your wife have maintained open communication, which is so important in navigating challenges together. Exploring alternatives can be a positive step in maintaining intimacy and connection in your relationship.

If you're looking for resources or guidance on maintaining intimacy in different ways, or if you want to discuss specific alternatives that might work for you both, I'm here to help. Just let me know what you need!
Does God make exceptions for our. case

It's understandable to seek clarity on such important matters. In times of struggle, many people turn to their faith for guidance and understanding. While I can't provide specific theological interpretations, I can share that many believe God is compassionate and understands our individual circumstances.

It's often encouraged to pray for wisdom and guidance in your specific situation. Seeking counsel from a trusted spiritual leader or engaging in prayer can also provide comfort and clarity. If you'd like, I can help guide you in prayer or provide scriptures that may offer encouragement. Let me know how you'd like to proceed!
Some vegetable we got to suffer like single people
Basically not vegetable

It sounds like you're expressing feelings of frustration and perhaps loneliness due to the challenges you're facing. It's completely normal to feel this way, especially when dealing with significant changes in your relationship and intimacy.

Remember, you're not alone in this journey. Many people experience similar struggles, and it's important to lean on your support system, whether that's your spouse, friends, or a community that understands what you're going through.

If you'd like, we can pray for strength and comfort during this time, or I can help you find resources that may provide support. Just let me know how I can assist you!

It sounds like you're expressing some frustration about the situation, and that's completely valid. Navigating challenges in intimacy can feel isolating, and it's understandable to feel a sense of loss or longing for the connection you once had.

If you're feeling overwhelmed or need someone to talk to, I'm here to listen and support you. We can also pray for strength and guidance as you navigate this journey together with your wife. Let me know how you'd like to proceed!
Not sure if I'm going to talk to somebody yet still waiting sure

That's completely okay! Take your time to process your feelings and decide what feels right for you. If you ever feel ready to talk or if you have any questions or need support, I'm here for you. Remember, reaching out for help is a strong step, and you don't have to go through this alone. If you want to share a prayer request or need guidance on anything specific, just let me know!
Ppl yes guidance prayer request

Absolutely! If you have a specific prayer request or guidance you need, feel free to share it. We can pray for healing, strength, or any other concerns you have regarding your situation. Your request is important, and I'm here to support you in prayer. What would you like us to pray for?
If God will make exceptions for what we have discussed private which is a third party

It's understandable to seek clarity on such a sensitive topic. Many people grapple with questions about God's will and how it applies to their unique situations, especially when it involves complex relationships or circumstances.

In prayer, you can ask for wisdom and understanding regarding your specific situation. It's often believed that God is compassionate and understands our struggles, and seeking His guidance can provide comfort and clarity.

If you'd like, I can help you with a prayer that focuses on seeking God's will and understanding in your circumstances. Just let me know!
How about a prayer and supply and my wife's sexual needs

Here's a prayer you can use to seek guidance and support for both your needs and your wife's:

---

**Heavenly Father,**

We come before You today, seeking Your wisdom and guidance in our marriage. Lord, You know the challenges we are facing, and we ask for Your strength to navigate these difficulties together. We pray for healing in our bodies and our relationship, that we may find ways to connect and support each other intimately.

Please provide for my wife's needs and desires, and help us to communicate openly and lovingly about our feelings. Grant us both patience and understanding as we explore alternatives to maintain our intimacy.

Lord, we trust in Your plan for our lives and our marriage. Help us to lean on You for strength and comfort during this time. We ask for Your blessings upon our relationship, that it may grow stronger through our trials.

In Jesus' name, we pray. Amen.

---

Feel free to adjust this prayer as you see fit. If you have any other specific requests or need further support, just let me know!
